scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm --filter shared run build
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently -k -s first --success first --hide 1,3 -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND,CYPRESS" -c "cyan,magenta,green" "pnpm --filter backend run dev" "pnpm --filter frontend run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && pnpm --filter e2e run test"
scripts.test:e2e:headless: concurrently -k -s first --success first --hide 1,3 -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND,CYPRESS" -c "cyan,magenta,green" "pnpm --filter backend run dev" "pnpm --filter frontend run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && pnpm --filter e2e run test"
scripts.test:e2e:open: concurrently -k -s first --kill-others-on-fail -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND,CYPRESS" -c "cyan,magenta,green" "pnpm --filter backend run dev" "pnpm --filter frontend run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && pnpm --filter e2e run test:open"
